About Me

Hi I'm Rashmika (Scarlet), a web developer, hacker, CTF player, penetration tester and much more, currently studying in Bachelor of Technology at one of the prestigious colleges of India, National Institute of Technology, Warangal. You can find me at @here .

Support my work!

I do a lot of things: I write, draw, code, hack, pentest, stream, and also drink a lot of coffee. I would love to keep doing what I love to do, but these things take time in energy. That's where you come in. By supporting what I do, I have less to worry about so I can go back to doing what I love 💖
